resources.string: If the location still fails after getting permission, please close the application and open it again to update the location again.
If there is no data, remove the widget and add a new one

This application only has a launcher widget, click the widget to update the weather immediately, usually automatically update once an hour, and stop the automatic update from 0:00 am to 6:00 am.\nFollow-up upgrades of the application are in the freezeit module group: 781222669\nCoolapk@JARK006
Please go to settings to enable location permission
Location SDK provided by Amap.com, weather data from \"Caiyun Weather\"
